name: Lexicon
description:
Drag letters to swap and create words. Make longer words for higher scores! The bonus word scores 10X! Form interlocked words for multiple-word bonuses.

Clear the level (use every letter) for additional bonuses. Levels are built from scrambled random words so every tile could be used!

Beat your own high score for achievements. Move up the leaderboard!

The 12000+ word dictionary can be extended with a custom bonus word list. Create your own lists for holidays, lessons, reading challenges!
